instructions.text: Remove Nose Housing (DPN239-009) and Nose Housing Nut (DPN239-011) from the tool.
instructions.picture_description: An image of the tool, including the nose housing and nose housing nut.

instructions.text: Remove Jaw Guide (DPN239-006, Jaws (PRG402-8A), Jaw Pusher (DPN239-144), and Pusher Spring (DPN901-001) from the pusher.
instructions.picture_description: An image showing the removal of various tool components.

instructions.text: Prepare tool for CORNER HEAD installation.
instructions.picture_description: An image depicting the tool ready for the installation.

instructions.text: Attach Draw Bolt Adapter (DPN239-192) and tighten.
instructions.picture_description: An image of attaching the draw bolt adapter to the tool.

instructions.text: Attach Corner Head Adapter (DPN239-191) and tighten.
instructions.picture_description: A device being assembled with a corner head adapter.

instructions.text: Tighten Socket Head Screw (DPN907-003) and fix the spin of Draw Bolt Adapter.
instructions.picture_description: The tightening of a socket head screw during assembly.

instructions.text: Remove Socket Screw (DPN907-003) and attach CORNER HEAD to Corner Head Adapter (DPN239-191).
instructions.picture_description: The removal of a socket screw to attach a corner head.

instructions.text: Set 8.5mm or less between CORNER HEAD and Corner Head Adapter (DPN239-191).
instructions.picture_description: Measurement being conducted to ensure proper spacing between components.

instructions.text: Tighten Nut of Corner Head to Corner Head Adapter (DPN239-191).
instructions.picture_description: The final tightening of the nut to secure the corner head.
